text: hershel_greene Fever 's gone down .
lori_grimes Baby ?
rick_grimes Carl ?
carl_grimes Sophia ? Is she okay ?
rick_grimes Fine . She 's fine .
lori_grimes Rest . We 'll be right here , okay ?
carl_grimes Okay .
theodore_douglas They 're here .
dale_horvath How is he ?
lori_grimes He 'll pull through dad , thanks to hershel and his people .
rick_grimes And Shane . We 'd have lost carl if not for him .
carol_peletier Thank god . We were so worried .
dale_horvath How 'd it happen ?
rick_grimes Hunting accident . That 's all -- just a stupid accident .

hershel_greene Blessed to be god , father of our lord Jesus christ . Praise be to him for the gift of our brother Otis , for his span of years , for his abundance of character;Otis , who gave his life to save a child 's , now more than ever , our most precious asset . We thank you , god , for the peace he enjoys in your embrace . He died as he lived , in grace . Shane , will you speak for Otis ?
shane_walsh I 'm not good at it . I 'm sorry .
patricia You were the last one with him . You shared his final moments . Please . I need to hear . I need to know his death had meaning .

shane_walsh Okay . We were about done . Almost out of ammo . We were down to pistols by then . I was limping . It was bad . Ankle all swollen up . """" We 've got to save the boy """" . See , that 's what he said .
shane_walsh He gave me his backpack . He shoved me ahead .
"shane_walsh """ Run """" , he said . He said , """" I 'll take the rear . I 'll cover you """" .
shane_walsh And when I looked back . If not for Otis , I 'd have never made it out alive . And that goes for carl too . It was Otis . He saved us both . If any death , ever had meaning , It was his .
hershel_greene How long has this girl been lost ?
rick_grimes This'll be day three .
maggie_greene County survey map . Shows terrain and elevations .
rick_grimes This is perfect . We can finally get this thing organized . We 'll grid the whole area , start searching in teams .

hershel_greene Not you . Not today . You gave three units of blood . You would n't be hiking five minutes in this heat before passing out . And your ankle -- push it now , you 'll be laid up a month , no good to anybody .
daryl_dixon Guess it 's just me . I 'm gon na head back to the creak , work my way from there . I can still be useful .
shane_walsh I 'll drive up to the interstate , see if Sophia wandered back .
rick_grimes All right , tomorrow then . We 'll start doing this right .
shane_walsh That means we ca n't have our people out there with just knives . They need the gun training we 've been promising them .
hershel_greene I 'd prefer you not carrying guns on my property . We 've managed so far without turning this into an armed camp .
shane_walsh All due respect , you get a crowd of those things wandering in here .
rick_grimes Look , we 're guests here . This is your property . And we will respect that . First things first set camp , find Sophia .
shane_walsh I hate to be the one to ask , but somebody 's got to . What happens if we find her and she 's bit ? I think we should all be clear on how we handle that .
rick_grimes You do what has to be done .
maggie_greene And her mother ? What do you tell her ?
andrea_harrison The truth .
shane_walsh I 'll gather and secure all the weapons . Make sure no one 's carrying till we 're at a practice range off site . I do request one rifleman on lookout . Dale 's got experience .
rick_grimes Our people would feel safer , less inclined to carry a gun .
shane_walsh Thank you .
maggie_greene That stuff you brought , got more antibiotics , bandages , anything like that ?
andrea_harrison Just what you 've seen .
maggie_greene We 're running short already . I should make a run into town .
rick_grimes Not the place shane went ?
maggie_greene No , there 's a pharmacy just a mile down the road . I 've down it before .
rick_grimes See our man there in the baseball cap ? That 's Glenn , our go - to - town expert . I 'd ask him along just to be cautious .
shane_walsh I hear he woke up .
lori_grimes Yeah . He 's in and out , but yeah . He 'll be all right .
shane_walsh That 's good . Did you mean it ?
lori_grimes What ?
shane_walsh You said stay . Did you mean it ? Look , if you did n't just say so . But do it now . I need to know .
lori_grimes I meant it .
shane_walsh All right then .
maggie_greene I hear you 're fast on your feet and know how to get in and out . Got a pharmacy run . You in ?
glenn_rhee Uh .
dale_horvath Miss , what 's the water situation here ?

maggie_greene Got five wells on our land . House draws directly from number one . Number - two well is right over there . We use it for the cattle but it 's just as pure . Take what you need . There 's a cart and containers in the generator shed behind the house . I 'll go saddle your horse then .
glenn_rhee Horse ?
andrea_harrison Give up our guns ?
shane_walsh You heard Rick . We 're guests here .
andrea_harrison And you 're okay with it ?
shane_walsh I do n't recall being asked . Now lay down your weapon .
andrea_harrison You may like rolling over , I do n't .

shane_walsh Look , I have to strip and clean them anyway . You still want to learn ? Go on . All right . Sit down . Unload your weapon . Hey hey . Check the chamber . Pull it back . Push that lever out . It 'll slide off . You 're halfway there .
rick_grimes Daryl . You okay on your own ?
daryl_dixon I 'm better on my own . I 'll be back before dark .
rick_grimes Hey . We got a base . We can get this search properly organized now .
daryl_dixon You got a point or are we just chatting ?
rick_grimes My point is it lets you off the hook . You do n't owe us anything .
daryl_dixon My other plans fell through .
rick_grimes We could give you more space . Set up over by the barn .

hershel_greene No , no need for that . Better you stay close to the house . I do n't say this easily , Rick . We do n't normally take in strangers . I ca n't have your people thinking this is permanent . Once you find this girl and your boy 's fit for travel , I expect you 'll move on . We need to be clear on that .
glenn_rhee Hello , farmer 's daughter .
lori_grimes Hi . Here 's your list . And , um , there 's one other item . I wrote it down separately . It 's personal . If we could be real discreet about that , okay ?
glenn_rhee Sure .
lori_grimes Thank you .
glenn_rhee Um , what is it ?
lori_grimes Kind of missing the point of the whole discreet thing , glenn .
glenn_rhee Oh , right . Um . I just need to know where to find it .
lori_grimes Try the feminine hygiene section .
glenn_rhee Oh . Enough said . Consider it done .
theodore_douglas I 'm not weak and I 'm not a coward .
dale_horvath I never said you were .
theodore_douglas No , what I said on the highway -- I do n't know what that was , where it came from . That was n't me . If It 's okay , I 'd rather you never told anybody about that stuff I said .
dale_horvath What stuff ? I could n't get a word out of you all day .
theodore_douglas Say , man , you think there 's a snowball 's chance we 'll actually find that little girl ?
dale_horvath For the first time in my life I 'm betting on the snowball .

theodore_douglas Yeah . Me too . Do whatever we have to . I do n't care if I have to comb the woods like Rambo or fetch a pail of water . Everyone kicks in , does their part . Am I right ? Do your part , do n't complain . That 's what I always-- .
dale_horvath I would n't drink that if I were you .
dale_horvath Looks like we 've got us a swimmer .
glenn_rhee How long do you think it 's been down there ?
andrea_harrison Long enough to grow gills .
lori_grimes We ca n't leave it in there . God knows what it 's doing to the water .
shane_walsh We got to get it out .
theodore_douglas Easy . Put a bullet in it 's head . I 'll get a rope .
maggie_greene Whoa whoa , guys . No .
glenn_rhee Why not ? It 's a good plan .
andrea_harrison It 's a stupid plan . If that thing has n't contaminated the water yet , blowing it 's brains out will finish the job .
shane_walsh She 's right . Ca n't risk it .
theodore_douglas So it has to come out alive ?
shane_walsh So to speak .
glenn_rhee How do we do that ?
hershel_greene The interstate where you broke down is here . There 's your creek . My farm is here . We 're looking out that way , south - southeast .
rick_grimes We missed this branch of the creek entirely . If she went that direction , she 'd be miles from where we looked .
hershel_greene Rick , take a moment . Come look . That 's something , is n't it ? It 's good to pause for an occasional reminder .
rick_grimes Of what ?
hershel_greene Whatever comes to mind . For me it 's often god . No thoughts on that ?
rick_grimes Last time I asked god for a favor and stopped to admire a view my son got shot . I try not to mix it up with the almighty anymore . Best we stay out of each other 's way .
hershel_greene lori told me your story -- how you were shot , the coma . Yet you came out of it somehow . You did not feel god 's hand in yours ?
rick_grimes At that moment ? No , I did not .
hershel_greene In all the chaos you found your wife and boy . Then he was shot and he survived . That tells you nothing ?
rick_grimes It tells me god 's got a strange sense of humor .
dale_horvath He 's not going for it .
theodore_douglas Maybe 'cause a canned ham do n't kick and scream when you try to eat it .
lori_grimes He 's right . There 's a reason the dead did n't come back to life . And start raiding our cupboards .
andrea_harrison We need live bait .
glenn_rhee Have I mentioned that I really like your new haircut ? You have a nice shaped head .
shane_walsh Do n't worry about it , bud . Hey , we 're gon na get you out of here in one piece .
glenn_rhee Living piece . That living part is important .
glenn_rhee Nice and slow , please .
andrea_harrison We got you .
maggie_greene Oh , you people are crazy .
shane_walsh You want to get it out of your well or not ?
dale_horvath Give us an eye there , maggie .
maggie_greene Doing okay ?
glenn_rhee Yup , doing great . Living the dream .
maggie_greene Little lower . Little more -Get it ! Get it ! -Grab it ! Grab it !
glenn_rhee Get me out of here !
glenn_rhee Get it off . Get off . Get off ! Get me out !
glenn_rhee Oh my god . Oh my god . Guys , get me out ! Come on , you guys . Get me out ! Oh god . Oh god . Oh my god ! Get me out of here ! -Pull ! -Pull ! Pull ! Pull ! Pull ! -Let 's go , pull .
glenn_rhee Get me out . Get me out . Come on . Come on -Glenn ! -Pull him up ! -Pull him up ! Pull him up !
glenn_rhee Get me out of here ! -Pull him up . Pull him up .
lori_grimes Are you okay ?
dale_horvath Back to the drawing board .
glenn_rhee Says you .
daryl_dixon Sophia ! Sophia !
dale_horvath We should seal off this well .
shane_walsh Yeah , might be a good idea .
andrea_harrison So what do we do about-- .
theodore_douglas Good thing we did n't do anything stupid like shoot it .
andrea_harrison We 'll come again tomorrow . You know there 's always the chance-- .
carol_peletier Do n't . I really do n't need to hear it anymore , Andrea . Save the thoughts and prayers .
shane_walsh You never know , carol .
shane_walsh We can hang targets along that fence line there . That rise , It gives a natural backstop . It 's a good idea .
andrea_harrison Thanks . So how long before I can carry ?
shane_walsh Let 's not get ahead of ourselves .
andrea_harrison I 'm not in a very patient frame of mind these days , Shane . You might have notice that .
shane_walsh No shit . Look , I ai n't worried about you offing yourself , even though you got old dale pissing his pants lately .
shane_walsh Yeah , I noticed that too .
andrea_harrison He did gone within a minute or so of being blown to hell because of me , to be fair .
shane_walsh Look , I see you have the desire for gun work and desire will take you a long way . But something you need to know , so file this carefully .
andrea_harrison I 'm listening .

shane_walsh Paper targets is one thing . Easy to hit what ai n't moving . But taking down an assailant , one that 's trying to kill you , it 's different . They say in that kind of situation things slow down . That 's crap . They speed up . Adrenalin , ha . It 'll cripple you if you let it . You need to use your instinct . You got to rule it out . Because somebody is going to die and you 'd better hope that you 're the one who 's making that decision .
andrea_harrison How ? I mean , how do you do that ?

shane_walsh Turn off a switch . The switch . The one that makes you scared or angry , sympathetic , whatever . You do n't think . You just -- you act . 'Cause odds are somebody else is counting on you . That 's your partner . That 's your friend . There ai n't nothing easy about taking a man 's life no matter how little value it may have . But when you get it done , you have to forget it .
shane_walsh I guess I have n't quite got that last part down yet .
andrea_harrison But you 're getting there ?
shane_walsh I hope so . It 's a good spot . It 'll do .
glenn_rhee You know , normally this is the kind of thing I 'd do on my own . Solo .
glenn_rhee It 's sort of my thing , you know ? I 'm a loner . You all right ?
maggie_greene I 'm fine .

glenn_rhee I saw the look on your face back at the well . Never seen one killed up close before ? Guess it 's kind of a shock . You know , being out on the road , we 've seen a lot . Guess we 've gotten a little numb to it .
maggie_greene Whoa . I guess so .
maggie_greene I 'll go see what antibiotics are left . What else is on the list ?
glenn_rhee Uh . why do n't you get started ?
maggie_greene What about you ?
glenn_rhee I 'm gon na look around , see what 's worth grabbing . Just some general stuff .
maggie_greene What do you got ?
glenn_rhee Uh . um . nothing . Just , like I said , general stuff .
maggie_greene Condoms ?
maggie_greene You got a girlfriend I do n't know about ?
glenn_rhee Me ? No . No .
maggie_greene Then you 're a pretty confident guy .
glenn_rhee No . No no no . I - I - I wasn't -- I would never-- .
maggie_greene Something wrong with me ?
glenn_rhee No . No , I-- .
glenn_rhee I would never have sex -- Uh , I'm -- I'm lost .
maggie_greene I 'll have sex with you .
glenn_rhee Really ? Why ?
maggie_greene You 're asking questions ?
glenn_rhee Okay , I ca n't help wondering .
maggie_greene It 's not like our options are vast these days . And you 're not the only one that 's lonely .
glenn_rhee Wow .
rick_grimes You need to reconsider .
hershel_greene I beg your pardon ?
rick_grimes Asking us to leave . You need to reconsider . If you saw how it is out there you would n't ask . You 're a man of belief . If you believe anything , believe that .
hershel_greene You 're putting me on the spot .

rick_grimes Well , I mean to . Those people look to me for answers . I wish they did n't , but they do . But I 'm not asking for them or myself . I 'm asking for my boy . After the price your friend Otis paid , the least you can do is give it some thought .
hershel_greene You 're a plainspoken man .
rick_grimes I 'm a father . He 's the one thing I do n't want to fail . I feel like I do every day . I lied to him this morning . It was n't a big lie , but it was enough .

hershel_greene My father did n't bother with comforting lies . He used his fist . He was a loveless , violent drunk and no good to anybody . He drove me home when I was 15 . Did n't lay eyes on this place again for many years . I was not at his deathbed , Rick . I would not grant him that and to this day do not regret it . Some men do not earn the love of their sons . I do n't see you having that problem .
rick_grimes Will you consider my request ?
hershel_greene There are aspects to this , things that I ca n't and wo n't discuss . But if you and your people respect my rules , no promises , but I will consider it . You have my word .
rick_grimes You have mine .
rick_grimes Hey . I 'll sit with him .
lori_grimes He was awake earlier when you were gone . He asked for you .
glenn_rhee I-- .
maggie_greene Do n't spoil it .
glenn_rhee So it was good .
maggie_greene It was a one - time thing .
hershel_greene Everything go okay ?
maggie_greene Fine . Nothing happened .
lori_grimes Did you find it ?
carol_peletier I cleaned up . Wanted it to be nice for her .
daryl_dixon For a second I thought I was in the wrong place .
carol_peletier A flower ?

daryl_dixon It 's a Cherokee Rose . The story is that when american soldiers were moving Indians off their land on the Trail of Tears the Cherokee mothers were grieving and crying so much 'cause they were losing their little ones along the way from exposure and disease and starvation . A lot of them just disappeared . So the elders , they said a prayer;asked for a sign to uplift the mother 's spirits , give them strength and hope . The next day this Rose started to grow right where the mothers tears fell . I 'm not fool enough to think there 's any flowers blooming for my brother . But I believe this one bloomed for your little girl .
daryl_dixon She 's gon na really like it in here .
carl_grimes Hey , dad .
rick_grimes Hey .
rick_grimes Carl , I told you something earlier today about Sophia-- .
carl_grimes I know . Mom told me .
rick_grimes Here I was getting ready to confess . I did n't mean to lie . I just did n't want to worry you . It 's a stupid excuse but it 's all I got .
carl_grimes It 's okay . Do you think we 'll find her ?
rick_grimes I know we will . Well . I do n't know . But I truly believe it .
carl_grimes You look tired .
rick_grimes I am tired .
carl_grimes Hey , I 'm like you now . We 've both been shot . Is n't that weird ?

rick_grimes Yeah , I think your mom would rather hear we got the same eyes . So let 's keep that between us . Since you 're in the club now , you get to wear the hat . Did n't you know ? We 'll pad the rim tomorrow so it sits better .
carl_grimes Wo n't you miss it ?
rick_grimes Maybe you 'll let me borrow it from time to time .
carl_grimes We can share it .
rick_grimes Okay . Sleep now .
carl_grimes Okay . I love you , dad .
rick_grimes I love you .
lori_grimes Are you putting them away ? Stay with him a while longer . I 'll wait up .
